replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
把完整的
crash-reports给发出来

replies.author: u盘05
replies.txt_content: .minecraft/crash-report文件夹里找最近的文档上传

replies.author: 明日的星
replies.txt_content: 不完整，信息太少，发完整的报告

replies.author: goodmingzi
replies.txt_content: 看起来像是实体有问题？把.minecraft/config/forge.cfg里面removeErroringEntities和removeErroringTileEntities两项改成true试试？如果有效的话，你的存档里可能会少点东西，丢少没事，丢太多就实在是没办法了

replies.author: 结城希亚
replies.txt_content:
在config文件夹里找到forge.cfg
把removeErroringEntities=false
removeErroringTileEntities=false
都改为true
开启自动清理错误实体功能

replies.author: 林轩轩
replies.txt_content:
